title: IT service management
text:
This component refers to an overarching framework for IT service management used to ensure effective, efficient and cost-effective
management of the delivery of business value from IT services.

This framework is typically based on global best practices.

It comprises a consistent framework within which the remaining IT governance components can operate in a tightly integrated manner.

For more information, see:
a) Wikipedia overview of IT service management
b) Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) website
c) ITIL publications
